title: I read the Hobbit book and I liked it. Will LOTR be much better or worse than the hobbit? - Quora
tags: The Lord of the Rings (creative franchise)

response.answer_text: I liked the hobbit more than LOTR.LOTR had a lot of lore and i felt the story was dragged out at points,it was too exhaustive for my liking and i ended up watching the movies instead. I think it’s a matter of personal preference and you should try reading it to get an inking of whether the book is for you. Happy reading :)
